name: DIY Assist
author: diyassist

sections.description:
DIY Assist Plugin for WordPress/WooCommerce

Maximize your in-house expertise and extend your technical service with the DIY Assist Plugin for WordPress and WooCommerce. This plugin offers a simple yet powerful way to connect your store to the DIY Assist platform, a hub that connects experts with customers seeking advice and solutions.

Key Features

Effortless Integration: The plugin connects your WooCommerce store with the DIY Assist platform using a unique ID. The setup process is straightforward, allowing you to focus on what matters most – serving your customers.

Easy Customer Enrollment: The plugin includes a simple checkbox labeled “Agree to pass my details to DIY Assist for account creation and support”. Once customers select this option, their details are securely passed to DIY Assist and they are automatically enrolled.

Expert Utilization: Register your experts on the DIY Assist platform. After any free consultation time you choose to offer, the clock starts ticking, and you can monetize your experts’ time effectively.

Expanded Customer Service: Extend your technical service by offering your customers access to your experts through DIY Assist. This not only increases your service capabilities but also strengthens customer trust and satisfaction.

Please note, due to the extensive functionality of DIY Assist, your experts must be registered with the platform directly. This ensures a seamless experience for your customers and allows you to capitalize on the platform’s robust features.

The DIY Assist Plugin for WordPress/WooCommerce is a game-changer for businesses looking to leverage their in-house expertise and deliver top-notch customer service. Install the plugin today and start transforming your business.

Use of 3rd Party Services

DIY Assist is the premier platform tailored to transform the way consumers, experts, and retailers seamlessly connect and collaborate.

For customers, DIY Assist offers convenient access to a wide range of expert advice and assistance. Whether you’re looking for guidance on home repairs, legal matters, financial planning, or other areas, our platform ensures you find reliable experts ready to provide personalized solutions.

Experts can share their unparalleled knowledge, showcase their expertise, and reach a wider audience. Connect with customers who are actively seeking the skills and insights you possess. With DIY Assist, you have the chance to maximise your impact, build your reputation, and generate income by providing remote consultations.

DIY’s service swagger API
Privacy Policy
DIY Assist Terms & Conditions
sections.installation:
1. Login to your WordPress installation.
  2. Install plugin by uploading diyassist.zip to /wp-content/plugins/.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu.
  4. Click on the diyassist left side menu enable the settings.

short_description: Seamlessly integrate WordPress and WooCommerce with DIY Assist credits for efficient technical support. Redeem with designated experts.
